title: I Would Like to Become a Fox You Like - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Death of Loved Ones   Demons   Destiny   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Goddesses   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Heaven   Heavenly Tribulation   Reincarnation   Unrequited Love
author: 公子凉夜
description:
The first life, she was Fairy Peony and secretly loved Emperor of Donghua in the Gods’ world, but he even didn’t remember her name…

The second life, he was an emperor in the mortal world, while she was mistaken as a demon and burned to death… Finally, she gave up and chose to jump into the gateway of Tiryagyoni…

So, the third life, she became a white fox, which was born in Green Mound, but inadvertently she met him again. He said that he would bring her to immortality and then she would get rid of suffering forever…>
